price: On im obećanja daje i lažnim nadama ih mami. A ono što im šejtan obećava samo je obmana.
arabic: يَعِدُهُمۡ وَيُمَنِّيهِمۡۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yaʿiduhum wayumannīhim wamā yaʿiduhumu al-shayṭānu illā ghurūran
